document.docAuthor: Yakovlev, Roman V., Saldaitis, Aidas, Kons, Hugo & Borth, Robert
document.masterDocTitle: A brief review of genus Catopta Staudinger, 1899 (Lepidoptera: Cossidae) with description of a new species from China

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: A brief review of genus Catopta Staudinger, 1899 (Lepidoptera: Cossidae) with description of a new species from China

subSubSection.paragraph:
Type species—
Catopta albimacula
Staudinger, 1899
: 157
. Original designation Synonymy:

= Newelskoia
Grum-Grshimailo, 1899
: 466 .

Type species—
Cossus albonubilus
Graeser, 1888
: 119
. Designation by monotypy = Catopa

: 152

Catopta
Staudinger, 1899
. =
Sinicossus
Clench, 1958
: 82
–84.

Sinicossus danieli
Clench, 1958
. Original designation.

LT: Korla, Centralasien [Korla, Xinjiang Prov., China ]. Type material: Syntypes in MHUB .

Dubatolov & Vasilenko 1988
;

; 2009 ; 2011 ).

.

subSubSection.paragraph: Type material: Holotype in MNHS .

Catopta albonubilosus
(sic!) birmanopta Bryk, 1950 : 48
. LT: Kambaiti, Nord Birma [Kambaiti, N. Myanmar ]. Type material: Holotype in MNHS .
Distribution: N. Myanmar (Yakovlev 2009 ).

Catopta tropicalis Yakovlev & Witt, 2009 : 14
.
LT: Vietnam (N), Mt. Fan-si-pan, W-side, Chapa, 1700 m , 22 ° 20 N, 103 ° 40 E. Type material: Holotype in MWM.
Distribution: N. Vietnam (Fan-Si-Pan Mts.).
Type material: Holotype in MHUB .
LT: A-tun-tse, Nord Yunnan, Talsohle [A-tun-tse ( 29 º 30 ’ N; 99 º E), N. Yunnan, China ] Type material: Holotype in ZFMK .

subSubSection.paragraph: Distribution: Sichuan, China .
LT: W China , Sichuan, Omei-Shan [Omei-Shan ( 29 º 30 ’ N; 102 º 45 ’ E), Sichuan, China ] Type material: Holotype in coll. Avinoff ( CMNH ) Distribution: China (Sichuan).

Catopta dusii Yakovlev, Saldaitis, Kons & Borth
sp. nov.
LT: China , W. Sichuan, road Dawe/Lushan, XilingXue Shan Mts. Type material: Holotype in MWM.
Distribution: known only from type locality.
LT: Rocharv, Pjandzh-Tal (Ruschan) [Rushan, Tadzhikistan ]. Type material: Holotype in ZMKU .

; Yakovlev 2009 ).
